import{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ParallaxStars(){const starsRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const handler=e=>{if(!starsRef.current)return;const x=(e.clientX/window.innerWidth-0.5)*15;const y=(e.clientY/window.innerHeight-0.5)*15;starsRef.current.style.transform=`translate(${x}px, ${y}px)`;};window.addEventListener('mousemove',handler);return()=>window.removeEventListener('mousemove',handler);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:starsRef,className:`
